name: Bubble Clash!
description:
Smash, pop and crash all bubbles in the super exciting puzzle game Bubble Clash! Download now and unlock thousands of crushing levels packed with awesome boosters and power-ups.

Don’t miss out on this incredible bubble popping fun - It’s extremely addictive!

Hit and pop all the balls and beat levels in this fun addictive bubble shooter puzzle game. Join the bubble shooter clash adventure, and overcome all the obstacles on your way to victory! Bubble Clash! is extremely fun and addictive and super easy to learn. Download now and play anytime and anywhere - no internet connection needed.

Join the fight, and experience this awesome and challenging bubble shooting war game where you have to hit and pop the balls, complete missions and clear levels. Play through thousands of bubble-packed levels and enjoy the most amazing gameplay with family and friends for hours of fun!

Use special boosters to explode balloons and advance in the combat:
- Earn the Fireball by popping 7 bubbles in a row. The Fireball will burn up bubbles on the way.
- Earn a Bomb by crushing 10 bubbles or more. The Bomb will take out surrounding bubbles.
Shoot pop, and burst bubbles to win levels.
- Your goal is to match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to blast and pop the combination and clear the board.
- Drag your finger to move the laser sight in the direction of the bubbles and lift your finger to shoot bubbles.
- Explode bubbles and create major ball drops with your family and friends.
- Plan your shots. See which color you are getting next and work out a strategy to smash and burst all bubbles using fewer shots.
- Win enough points to reach high scores and earn 3 stars on every level.

Fun Features:
- Shining silver balloons - create cool explosion clashes with them.
- Plenty of bubble puzzles and challenges to solve - make sure to have a battle tactic!
- Free bubble swap - just tap on the bubble to change its color and blast it.
- Play Bubble Clash! Online or offline - no WiFi required!
- This super fun shooter war game is perfect for the whole family.
- Completely free to play - join the war battling game adventure today!
- Bubble Clash! Is seriously fun, and so easy to learn!

Aim and shoot until you create explosions and clashes, pop bubbles, and beat all the challenges in this incredibly brilliant and addictive bubble shooter puzzle game! Join the fun and experience hours of pure entertainment. Form a group of 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop and crash them, and win awesome boosts and challenges!

Challenge yourself with thousands of exciting levels as you advance through one of the best shooting games. Use your logic and matching skills to overcome the obstacles and create large bubble drops. Play and enjoy an addictive game mode, plenty of challenges and adventures - you won’t be able to put it down!

Liked the game? We would love to get your feedback! Let us know what we can add to make your gameplay even more enjoyable and earn your 5-star review.

Bubble Clash! is free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment.
